name: Unstabled Horse Game
description:
You are a horse.

Well not the whole horse, just the tail.

The horse is called Callum Longface.

Swat the flies on Callum or he'll get frustrated.

You wouldn't like him when he's frustrated.

You can't swat flies with the whole tail, just the tip.

Click the screen to swish the tail.

Made for Ludum Dare 49
